thread.title: Bristol fire: Colston St could be closed for rest of week
thread.title_full: Bristol fire: Colston St could be closed for rest of week | West Country (E) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Bristol fire: Colston St could be closed for rest of week
text:
Colston St is expected to be closed for the rest of the week. Credit: Stephen Davis People living and working near the site of the huge fire in central Bristol are expected to be allowed back later today.
The fire broke out in student flats in Colston Street yesterday afternoon - the road is expected to be closed for the rest of the week.
An investigation into the cause of the blaze is underway, but the fire service says there have been initial reports that it started in a kitchen.
More than a 120 students will need rehousing .
Fire crews on the scene. Credit: Avon Fire & Rescue Last updated Tue 13 Oct 2015 Read more 8 updates Huge blaze in Bristol centre Travel Bristol
